definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
to sit quietly/to meditate/to stage a sit-in
(of a person's manner or character) gentle and quiet

sentences.english: Suddenly, I felt the fall of the quiet, Jingde only the lonely.
sentences.chinese: 忽然間我感到了秋的靜，靜得只剩下了寂寞。

sentences.english: Fuck, eat shit in Li Jing, immortality is useless.
sentences.chinese: 他媽的，於靜麗喫屎，不死也沒用。

sentences.english: Realizing data exchange to reflect coupling between fluid and structures is essential to solving static aeroelasticity problems.
sentences.chinese: 研究靜氣動彈性問題一大關鍵是要解決流固數據耦合。

sentences.english: Secondly, static and dynamic analysis on the single-leg jacket platform was employed.
sentences.chinese: 其次，對單立柱平臺進行靜動力數值分析。

sentences.english: What is the hydrostatic pressure at 5000 feet?
sentences.chinese: 在5000英尺深處靜壓力是多少？

sentences.english: It has been used in static and dynamic analysis.
sentences.chinese: 它已應用於靜動力應力分析問題。

sentences.english: A design method of the 1MN force standard machine control system was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了1MN靜重式力標準機控制系統的設計。

sentences.english: Silence, silence, they can even hear the breath evenly.
sentences.chinese: 萬籟俱寂，靜的甚至可以聽見她們均勻的鼻息。

sentences.english: The noised classroom becomes quiet and we are astonished to look over at Ouyang.
sentences.chinese: 亂哄哄的教室靜了下來，我們驚異地望着歐陽老師。

sentences.english: She has a quiet dignity about her.
sentences.chinese: 她身上有一種嫺靜的高貴氣質。

sentences.english: The mentioned analysis method can also be used for the static analysis of the more complicated multi-component mooring lines.
sentences.chinese: 對更爲複雜的複合錨泊線的靜特性可用同樣方法處理。

sentences.english: The crowd suddenly grew quiet. The drunk, however, seemed quite sure of himself.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆突然靜了下來，可這醉漢像是很有把握似的。

sentences.english: Please be quiet while I figure out the correct amount.
sentences.chinese: 我在計算出正確數額的當兒，請安靜一點。

sentences.english: Advanced meditation may promote the realization of transpersonal goals.
sentences.chinese: 高級的靜修還有助於超個人目標的實現。

sentences.english: All of us hushed when the President walked in.
sentences.chinese: 當總統走進來時，我們大家全都靜了下來。

sentences.english: Then, a few shovel- fulls later, he quieted down completely.
sentences.chinese: 幾鏟滿滿的土下去後，驢完全靜了下來。

definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
